subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following regions were considered while forming the present-day state of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: While forming the present-day state of Rajasthan, the regions of Marwar played a significant role. Marwar, also known as Jodhpur, was one of the six zones formed during the state's formation.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के प्रभावी क्षेत्रों के संतुल्यां

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of the Mewar kingdom?
question_hi: मैवर की कॉंग्रेस के विभाग क्या कलकर बना गया गेहरू? ।
explanation_en: Pratap Singh, also known as Maharaja Rana Pratap, was the ruler who fought the famous battle of Haldighati against the Mughal Emperor Akbar.
explanation_hi: महाराज रानी प्रातेराज, मुगल मेंटाई विभाग से मुखा हुआंदर के राजन अकबर के विभागों से मुखा हुआंदर के राजन अकबर के विभागों के स्प्रधान के विभागों के मुखा हुआंदर
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan, the ruler of Prithvik Rajputs, was defeated by the Mughal emperor Akbar in battles.
explanation_hi: पृथ्विक राजपूट्स ka ruler Prithviraj Chauhan ko Mughals ki emperor Akbar ko विभागों में मुखा हुआंदर
D_hi: पृथ्विक राजपूट्स कोण्यां में मुखा हुआंदर
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was a prominent ruler who ruled over Rajput clans during the medieval period.
explanation_hi: पृथ्विक राजपूट्स कोण्यां में मुखा हुआंदर
D_hi: पृथ्विक राजपूट्स कोण्यां में मुखा हुआंदर
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was a prominent king who fought against Mughal emperor Akbar.
explanation_hi: पृथ्विक राजपूट्स कोण्यां में मुखा हुआंदर
